MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.02AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.31AM on 3rd February 2021.
